Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

enumLongDescriptions.AirFlow: This value shall indicate a measurement of a volume of gas per unit of time, in cubic feet per minute units, that flows through a particular junction.  The ReadingUnits property shall contain `[ft_i]3/min`.
enumLongDescriptions.Altitude: This value shall indicate a measurement of altitude, in meter units, defined as the elevation above sea level.  The ReadingUnits property shall contain `m`.
enumLongDescriptions.Barometric: This value shall indicate a measurement of barometric pressure, in millimeters of a mercury column.  The ReadingUnits property shall contain `mm[Hg]`.
enumLongDescriptions.Current: This value shall indicate a measurement of the root mean square (RMS) of instantaneous current calculated over an integer number of line cycles for a circuit.  Current is expressed in ampere units and the ReadingUnits property shall contain `A`.
enumLongDescriptions.EnergyJoules: This value shall indicate the energy, integral of real power over time, of the monitored item.  If representing metered power consumption the value shall reflect the power consumption since the sensor metrics were last reset.  The value of the Reading property shall be in joule units and the ReadingUnits property shall contain `J`.  This value is used for device-level energy consumption measurements, while `EnergykWh` is used for large-scale consumption measurements.
enumLongDescriptions.EnergykWh: This value shall indicate the energy, integral of real power over time, of the monitored item.  If representing metered power consumption the value shall reflect the power consumption since the sensor metrics were last reset.  The value of the Reading property shall be in kilowatt-hour units and the ReadingUnits property shall contain `kW.h`.  This value is used for large-scale energy consumption measurements, while `EnergyJoules` and `EnergyWh` are used for device-level consumption measurements.
enumLongDescriptions.Frequency: This value shall indicate a frequency measurement, in hertz units.  The ReadingUnits property shall contain `Hz`.
enumLongDescriptions.Humidity: This value shall indicate a relative humidity measurement, in percent units.  The ReadingUnits property shall contain `%`.
enumLongDescriptions.LiquidFlow: This value shall indicate a measurement of a volume of liquid per unit of time, in liters per second units, that flows through a particular junction.  The ReadingUnits property shall contain `L/s`.
enumLongDescriptions.LiquidLevel: This value shall indicate a measurement of fluid height, in centimeter units, relative to a specified vertical datum and the ReadingUnits property shall contain `cm`.
enumLongDescriptions.Power: This value shall indicate the arithmetic mean of product terms of instantaneous voltage and current values measured over integer number of line cycles for a circuit, in watt units.  The ReadingUnits property shall contain `W`.
enumLongDescriptions.Pressure: This value shall indicate a measurement of force, in pascal units, applied perpendicular to the surface of an object per unit area over which that force is distributed.  The ReadingUnits property shall contain `Pa`.
enumLongDescriptions.Rotational: This value shall indicate a measurement of rotational frequency, in revolutions per minute unit.  The ReadingUnits property shall contain either `{rev}/min`, which is preferred, or `RPM`, which is a deprecated value.
enumLongDescriptions.Temperature: This value shall indicate a temperature measurement, in degrees Celsius units.  The ReadingUnits property shall contain `Cel`.
enumLongDescriptions.Voltage: This value shall indicate a measurement of the root mean square (RMS) of instantaneous voltage calculated over an integer number of line cycles for a circuit.  Voltage is expressed in volt units and the ReadingUnits property shall contain `V`.

ResetMetrics.description: Resets metrics related to this sensor.
ResetMetrics.longDescription: This action shall reset any time intervals or counted values for this sensor.  The SensorResetTime property shall be updated to reflect the time that this action was performed.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Sensor.description: The Sensor schema describes a sensor and its properties.
Sensor.longDescription: This resource shall represent a sensor for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Accuracy.description: The estimated percent error of measured versus actual values.
Accuracy.longDescription: This property shall contain the percent error +/- of the measured versus actual values of the Reading property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

AdjustedMaxAllowableOperatingValue.description: The adjusted maximum allowable operating value for this equipment based on the environmental conditions.
AdjustedMaxAllowableOperatingValue.longDescription: This property shall contain the adjusted maximum allowable operating value for the equipment that this sensor monitors, as specified by a standards body, manufacturer, or both.  The value is adjusted based on environmental conditions.  For example, liquid inlet temperature can be adjusted based on the available liquid pressure.

AdjustedMinAllowableOperatingValue.description: The adjusted minimum allowable operating value for this equipment based on the environmental conditions.
AdjustedMinAllowableOperatingValue.longDescription: This property shall contain the adjusted minimum allowable operating value for the equipment that this sensor monitors, as specified by a standards body, manufacturer, or both.  This value is adjusted based on environmental conditions.  For example, liquid inlet temperature can be adjusted based on the available liquid pressure.

ApparentVA.description: The product of voltage and current for an AC circuit, in volt-ampere units.
ApparentVA.longDescription: This property shall contain the product of voltage (RMS) multiplied by current (RMS) for a circuit.  This property can appear in sensors of the Power ReadingType, and shall not appear in sensors of other ReadingType values.

ElectricalContext.longDescription: This property shall represent the combination of current-carrying conductors that distribute power.

LoadPercent.description: The power load utilization for this sensor.
LoadPercent.longDescription: This property shall indicate the power load utilization percent for this sensor.  This property can appear in sensors of the Power ReadingType, and shall not appear in sensors of other ReadingType values.

Location.description: The location information for this sensor.
Location.longDescription: This property shall indicate the location information for this sensor.

MaxAllowableOperatingValue.description: The maximum allowable operating value for this equipment.
MaxAllowableOperatingValue.longDescription: This property shall contain the maximum allowable operating value for the equipment that this sensor monitors, as specified by a standards body, manufacturer, or both.

MinAllowableOperatingValue.description: The minimum allowable operating value for this equipment.
MinAllowableOperatingValue.longDescription: This property shall contain the minimum allowable operating value for the equipment that this sensor monitors, as specified by a standards body, manufacturer, or both.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

PeakReading.longDescription: This property shall contain the peak sensor value since the last ResetMetrics action was performed or the service last reset the time-based property values.

PeakReadingTime.description: The time when the peak sensor value occurred.
PeakReadingTime.longDescription: This property shall contain the date and time when the peak sensor value was observed.

PhysicalContext.description: The area or device to which this sensor measurement applies.
PhysicalContext.longDescription: This property shall contain a description of the affected component or region within the equipment to which this sensor measurement applies.

PhysicalSubContext.description: The usage or location within a device to which this sensor measurement applies.
PhysicalSubContext.longDescription: This property shall contain a description of the usage or sub-region within the equipment to which this sensor measurement applies.  This property generally differentiates multiple sensors within the same PhysicalContext instance.

PowerFactor.description: The power factor for this sensor.
PowerFactor.longDescription: This property shall identify the quotient of real power (W) and apparent power (VA) for a circuit.  PowerFactor is expressed in unit-less 1/100ths.  This property can appear in sensors containing a ReadingType value of `Power`, and shall not appear in sensors of other ReadingType values.

Precision.description: The number of significant digits in the reading.
Precision.longDescription: This property shall contain the number of significant digits in the Reading property.

ReactiveVAR.description: The square root of the difference term of squared apparent VA and squared power (Reading) for a circuit, in VAR units.
ReactiveVAR.longDescription: This property shall contain the arithmetic mean of product terms of instantaneous voltage and quadrature current measurements calculated over an integer number of line cycles for a circuit.  This property can appear in sensors of the Power ReadingType, and shall not appear in sensors of other ReadingType values.

Reading.longDescription: This property shall contain the sensor value.

ReadingRangeMax.description: The maximum possible value for this sensor.
ReadingRangeMax.longDescription: This property shall indicate the maximum possible value of the Reading property for this sensor.  This value is the range of valid readings for this sensor.  Values outside this range are discarded as reading errors.

ReadingRangeMin.description: The minimum possible value for this sensor.
ReadingRangeMin.longDescription: This property shall indicate the minimum possible value of the Reading property for this sensor.  This value is the range of valid readings for this sensor.  Values outside this range are discarded as reading errors.

ReadingType.longDescription: This property shall contain the type of the sensor.

ReadingUnits.description: The units of the reading and thresholds.
ReadingUnits.longDescription: This property shall contain the units of the sensor's reading and thresholds.

SensingFrequency.description: The time interval between readings of the physical sensor.
SensingFrequency.longDescription: This property shall contain the time interval between readings of the physical sensor.

SensorResetTime.description: The date and time when the time-based properties were last reset.
SensorResetTime.longDescription: This property shall contain the date and time when the ResetMetrics action was last performed or the service last reset the time-based property values.

Status.description: The status and health of the resource and its subordinate or dependent resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the resource.

Thresholds.description: The set of thresholds defined for this sensor.
Thresholds.longDescription: This property shall contain the set of thresholds that derive a sensor's health and operational range.

VoltageType.description: The voltage type for this sensor.
VoltageType.longDescription: This property shall represent the type of input voltage the sensor monitors.

SensorArrayExcerpt.description: The Sensor schema describes a sensor and its properties.
SensorArrayExcerpt.longDescription: This resource shall represent a sensor for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

DataSourceUri.longDescription: This property shall contain a URI to the resource that provides the source of the excerpt contained within this copy.

PhysicalContext.description: The area or device to which this sensor measurement applies.
PhysicalContext.longDescription: This property shall contain a description of the affected component or region within the equipment to which this sensor measurement applies.

PhysicalSubContext.description: The usage or location within a device to which this sensor measurement applies.
PhysicalSubContext.longDescription: This property shall contain a description of the usage or sub-region within the equipment to which this sensor measurement applies.  This property generally differentiates multiple sensors within the same PhysicalContext instance.

Reading.longDescription: This property shall contain the sensor value.

SensorPowerArrayExcerpt.longDescription: This resource shall represent a sensor for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ApparentVA.description: The product of voltage and current for an AC circuit, in volt-ampere units.
ApparentVA.longDescription: This property shall contain the product of voltage (RMS) multiplied by current (RMS) for a circuit.  This property can appear in sensors of the Power ReadingType, and shall not appear in sensors of other ReadingType values.

DataSourceUri.description: The link to the resource that provides the data for this sensor.
DataSourceUri.longDescription: This property shall contain a URI to the resource that provides the source of the excerpt contained within this copy.

PhysicalContext.description: The area or device to which this sensor measurement applies.
PhysicalContext.longDescription: This property shall contain a description of the affected component or region within the equipment to which this sensor measurement applies.

PhysicalSubContext.description: The usage or location within a device to which this sensor measurement applies.
PhysicalSubContext.longDescription: This property shall contain a description of the usage or sub-region within the equipment to which this sensor measurement applies.  This property generally differentiates multiple sensors within the same PhysicalContext instance.

PowerFactor.description: The power factor for this sensor.
PowerFactor.longDescription: This property shall identify the quotient of real power (W) and apparent power (VA) for a circuit.  PowerFactor is expressed in unit-less 1/100ths.  This property can appear in sensors containing a ReadingType value of `Power`, and shall not appear in sensors of other ReadingType values.

ReactiveVAR.description: The square root of the difference term of squared apparent VA and squared power (Reading) for a circuit, in VAR units.
ReactiveVAR.longDescription: This property shall contain the arithmetic mean of product terms of instantaneous voltage and quadrature current measurements calculated over an integer number of line cycles for a circuit.  This property can appear in sensors of the Power ReadingType, and shall not appear in sensors of other ReadingType values.

Reading.longDescription: This property shall contain the sensor value.

SensorPowerExcerpt.description: The Sensor schema describes a sensor and its properties.
SensorPowerExcerpt.longDescription: This resource shall represent a sensor for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ApparentVA.description: The product of voltage and current for an AC circuit, in volt-ampere units.
ApparentVA.longDescription: This property shall contain the product of voltage (RMS) multiplied by current (RMS) for a circuit.  This property can appear in sensors of the Power ReadingType, and shall not appear in sensors of other ReadingType values.

DataSourceUri.description: The link to the resource that provides the data for this sensor.
DataSourceUri.longDescription: This property shall contain a URI to the resource that provides the source of the excerpt contained within this copy.

PowerFactor.description: The power factor for this sensor.
PowerFactor.longDescription: This property shall identify the quotient of real power (W) and apparent power (VA) for a circuit.  PowerFactor is expressed in unit-less 1/100ths.  This property can appear in sensors containing a ReadingType value of `Power`, and shall not appear in sensors of other ReadingType values.

ReactiveVAR.description: The square root of the difference term of squared apparent VA and squared power (Reading) for a circuit, in VAR units.
ReactiveVAR.longDescription: This property shall contain the arithmetic mean of product terms of instantaneous voltage and quadrature current measurements calculated over an integer number of line cycles for a circuit.  This property can appear in sensors of the Power ReadingType, and shall not appear in sensors of other ReadingType values.

Reading.longDescription: This property shall contain the sensor value.

Threshold.description: The threshold definition for a sensor.
Threshold.longDescription: This type shall contain the properties for an individual threshold for this sensor.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Activation.description: The direction of crossing that activates this threshold.
Activation.longDescription: This property shall indicate the direction of crossing of the reading for this sensor that activates the threshold.

DwellTime.description: The duration the sensor value must violate the threshold before the threshold is activated.
DwellTime.longDescription: This property shall indicate the duration the sensor value violates the threshold before the threshold is activated.

Reading.longDescription: This property shall indicate the reading for this sensor that activates the threshold.  The value of the property shall use the same units as the Reading property.

enumDescriptions.Either: Value crosses the threshold in either direction.

enumLongDescriptions.Decreasing: This threshold is activated when the reading changes from a value higher than the threshold to a value lower than the threshold.
enumLongDescriptions.Either: This threshold is activated when either the increasing or decreasing conditions are met.
enumLongDescriptions.Increasing: This threshold is activated when the reading changes from a value lower than the threshold to a value higher than the threshold.

Thresholds.description: The set of thresholds defined for a sensor.
Thresholds.longDescription: This object shall contain the set of thresholds that derive a sensor's health and operational range.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

LowerCaution.description: The value at which the reading is below normal range.
LowerCaution.longDescription: This property shall contain the value at which the Reading property is below normal range.  The value of the property shall use the same units as the Reading property.

LowerCritical.description: The value at which the reading is below normal range but not yet fatal.
LowerCritical.longDescription: This property shall contain the value at which the Reading property is below the normal range but is not yet fatal.  The value of the property shall use the same units as the Reading property.

LowerFatal.description: The value at which the reading is below normal range and fatal.
LowerFatal.longDescription: This property shall contain the value at which the Reading property is below the normal range and is fatal.  The value of the property shall use the same units as the Reading property.

UpperCaution.description: The value at which the reading is above normal range.
UpperCaution.longDescription: This property shall contain the value at which the Reading property is above the normal range.  The value of the property shall use the same units as the Reading property.

UpperCritical.description: The value at which the reading is above normal range but not yet fatal.
UpperCritical.longDescription: This property shall contain the value at which the Reading property is above the normal range but is not yet fatal.  The value of the property shall use the same units as the Reading property.

UpperFatal.description: The value at which the reading is above normal range and fatal.
UpperFatal.longDescription: This property shall contain the value at which the Reading property is above the normal range and is fatal.  The value of the property shall use the same units as the Reading property.

title: #Sensor.v1_0_9.Sensor
